general: Today, the Moon in harmony with Neptune stimulates your creativity and intuition. You feel particularly connected to others and to yourself. It is an ideal day to explore your emotions and share them with those around you.
love: Express your feelings without hesitation, sincerity will be your asset.
work: Collaborate with your colleagues, new ideas will emerge from your exchanges.
health: Take the time to meditate or recharge in nature to balance your energy.
advice: Listen to your heart, it will guide you.
teaser: A day of creativity and connection!
